mapper.insert: insert into test_paper(bank_id, paper_no, user_id, status, s_num, m_num, t_num, s_score, m_score, t_score, total_score) values(#{bankId}, #{paperNo}, #{userId}, #{status}, #{sNum}, #{mNum}, #{tNum}, #{sScore}, #{mScore}, #{tScore}, #{totalScore})
mapper.select: select max(paper_no) from test_paper where user_id = #{userId} and substr(paper_no, 1, 8) = #{date}

insert into paper_question(paper_id, question_id, no, selected) values
(#{item.paperId}, #{item.questionId}, #{item.no}, #{item.selected})
mapper.select: select a.id, bank_id, paper_no, user_id, status, s_num, m_num, t_num, s_score, m_score, t_score, total_score, b.name from test_paper a left join question_bank b on a.bank_id = b.id where user_id = #{userId}
